bibl.title: Some More Elaborate Epistolary Addresses.
bibl.note: I. Supplement to: Stephen LLEWELYN, The εἰς (τὴν) οἰκίαν Formula and the Delivery of Letters to third Persons or to their Property, ZPE 101 (1994) pp. 71-78. - II. Edition of P. Duke Inv. 234. Private letter on ostracon. Provenance unknown, third/fourth century.
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, Some More Elaborate Epistolary Addresses.
